item.title: Access and Process Quikscat Wind speed and direction with R
item.description: quikscat In his An Introduction to the Near–Real–Time QuikSCAT Data, Hoffman (2005) described the primary mission of the SeaWinds instrument on the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) Quick Scatterometer (QuikSCAT ) satellite was to retrieve the surface vector wind over the global ocean (Lungu 2001). QuikSCAT has provided an extremely accurate and extraordinarily comprehensive view of the surface wind over the global ocean since July 1999 (Chelton et al.
